function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential release of SARS-CoV-2 virus from uncoated samples in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of disease propagation and transmission","Mitigation":"Use of porous coating of Cu 2 O/PU to reduce infective titer of SARS-CoV-2","Technologies":"Porous coating of Cu 2 O/PU","People":"Individuals in the built environment","Owner":"Health and safety authorities, facility managers, and building owners"},{"Description":"Potential failure of other coating technologies (amine and ammonium-based polymers) to inactivate the virus","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of SARS-CoV-2 in the built environment","Mitigation":"Not using amine and ammonium-based polymers for virus inactivation","Technologies":"Alternative virus-inactivating methods","People":"Researchers, manufacturers, and regulators","Owner":"Research institutions, regulatory agencies, and industry organizations"},{"Description":"Risk of mechanical damage to the coating leading to loss of virus-inactivating properties","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of the coating in controlling the virus spread","Mitigation":"Regular assessment and maintenance of the coating integrity","Technologies":"Coating integrity testing and maintenance equipment","People":"Maintenance personnel, building managers, and facility maintenance teams","Owner":"Building owners, maintenance contractors"}]}
